name: CDC PLACES Project Data
description: This dataset, sourced from the CDC PLACES Project, provides local-level health data, including chronic disease indicators and health behaviors. It includes data on variables such as obesity, physical inactivity, mental health, and other health-related metrics, which can be analyzed at the state level in the United States.

creator.name: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC)

variableMeasured.name: Stroke among adults
variableMeasured.description: Percentage of adults diagnosed with stroke.

variableMeasured.name: Arthritis among adults
variableMeasured.description: Percentage of adults diagnosed with arthritis.

variableMeasured.name: Obesity among adults
variableMeasured.description: Percentage of adults classified as obese.

variableMeasured.name: Depression among adults
variableMeasured.description: Percentage of adults diagnosed with depression.

citation: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, PLACES Project 2022
